channel.title: loggly on Vegetable Programing
channel.description: Recent content in loggly on Vegetable Programing

item.title: 画面（フロント）から通知したい
item.description: ファイルの読込 loggly.tracker.js loggly-jslogger/src at master · loggly/loggly-jslogger 初期化 var _LTracker = _LTracker || []; ;(function($) { $(function() { var logglySettings = { 'logglyKey': null, 'sendConsoleErrors' : true, 'tag' : null } logglySettings['logglyKey'] = $("meta[name='loggly_key']").attr('content'); logglySettings['tag'] = $("meta[name='loggly_tag']").attr('content'); _LTracker.push(logglySettings); }); })(jQuery); HTMLに情報の埋め込み <meta name="loggly_key" content="<?php echo('loggly_of_key'); ?>" /> <meta name="loggly_tag" content="<?php echo('loggly_of_tag');
